summary: Rookie movie director Koichi and his crew travels to the mountain village of Yamamura to film his next movie. The villagers are eventually enlisted to help film the movie and, in particular... See full summary »
cast: Kôji Yakusho|Shun Oguri|Tsutomu Yamazaki|Masatô Ibu|Yoshiyuki Morishita|Kengo Kôra|Asami Usuda
title: Kitsutsuki to ame
